summary.0: A Frontend Engineer with over 2 years of experience in developing applications using React and Next.js I also have experience in working on projects related to ecommerce, landing pages, and mobile applications. In addition, I've been involved in controlling unmanned aerial vehicles through communication with the robot system (ROS) using the MQTT protocol. Furthermore, I have nearly 1 year of experience in backend development with Nest.js and Node.js.
summary.1: I am always dedicated and serious about my work to create value for the company. At the same time, I always seek to learn and improve my skills and knowledge to become a good engineer.

2.title: Frameworks/Platforms
2.details: NodeJS (Express), ReactJS, React Native, WebSocket, NextJS, NestJS.

7.title: Experience
7.details:
Experience with RESTful API design and implementation. 
 Familiar with Agile/Scrum development methodologies

project.title: Phenikaa-X Website and Drone in a Box (DIB) Web Service.
project.description: Deploying monitoring and advertising applications for the company, controlling and providing web services for autonomous vehicles and unmanned aerial vehicles.
project.technologies: NestJS, Postgres, Docker, MQTT, NextJS, Vue3, tailwindcss, WebSocket.

responsibilities.0: Constructing the code structure and conventions for all front-end and back-end projects.
responsibilities.1: Communicating with stakeholders to build and design WebService systems.
responsibilities.2: Designing database schemas and implementing back-end systems to manage data from the DIB system and provide it to the front-end application.
responsibilities.3: Implementing communication between the back-end system and the DIB system through the MQTT protocol for data collection and command execution.
responsibilities.4: Optimizing the process of reading and writing data from Web Socket to Postgres by improving database queries.
responsibilities.5: Researching and building services on drones to decode data information, issue commands, and communicate with the back-end system via WebSocket.
responsibilities.6: Managing code and deploying UI/UX with design through Figma to create websites.
